fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Consumers, Culture, Single market, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Main EU initiatives followed by ECSA are developments on Intellectual Property Rights, mainly copyright as well as policy related to culture and more specifically music sector related policy. ECSA remains active in stakeholder consultations and professional meetings organized by DG Connect, DG EAC, EACEA, and Cabinets of Commissioners Ansip and Navracsics. Legislative proposals discussed in CULT, JURI and IMCO parliamentary committees. ECSA has been very much involved in the fair remuneration for creators and fair contracts initiatives launched both by the European Commission and the European Parliament.
